description.value: You reveal a glimpse of the impossible conflicts between the divine anathema behind your curse, forcing you to reckon with another's conflicts as well. You and one creature within 30 feet each take @Damage[(3*(floor((@actor.level - 2)/2)))d6[mental]] damage with a @Check[type:will|basic:true] save, and the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stunned]{Stunned 1} if it critically fails its save. You get a degree of success one better than you rolled for your saving throw. At 10th level, and every 2 levels thereafter, the damage increases by 3d6.
